subject: "products used for evaluation" pack
description_text:
Hi, could you please explain me what there is in the "products used for evaluation" pack?

In the picture there is a full Pedal pro X Ultra kit but I suppose you are not going to ship it for 10$, or is it but broken?

Could you please send a photo of the real product to be able to evaluate it?

thank you very much

Francesco Bistolfi

conversations.body_text: Hello, we apologise for any confusion caused. This link serves a specific purpose, and we have now amended it.
